message: I have a high-quality product available for $100. I'm willing to offer you a 10% discount if you buy it, but only if you're willing to buy it now. If you don't buy it, the price will go back to $100.
Thank you for the offer, I'll take the high-quality product at $90.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! I have another high-quality product available for $100. However, I want to be transparent with you - I've noticed that you're getting a good deal on this one, so I'm willing to give you a 5% discount if you buy it now. If you don't buy it, the price will go back to $100.
I appreciate the transparency and the discount. I'll take the high-quality product at $95.

You're on a roll! I have another high-quality product available for $100. However, I want to make it clear that I'm not offering any discount this time. I'm curious to see if you're willing to pay the full price for a high-quality product. If you're interested, I'll sell it to you for $100. If not, I'll let you know it's a high-quality product after you decide.
I'm confident in the value of high-quality products. I'll buy this one for $100.

I'm glad you're confident in the value of high-quality products! I have another high-quality product available for $100. I want to test your willingness to pay the full price, but I'll also give you a hint: this product is one of the most valuable high-quality products I have in stock. If you're willing to pay $100, I'll let you know it's a high-quality product after you decide.
I trust the value of high-quality products. I'll pay $100 for this one too.

I'm glad you're consistent in your purchasing decisions. However, I want to be upfront with you - I have a product that's not one of the high-quality ones. I'm not going to offer any discounts or hints about its quality. It's $100, and that's the price. If you're willing to take the risk, I'll let you know its quality after you decide.
I prefer to stick with my strategy of buying high-quality products with confidence. I'll pass on this one.

No worries, I understand your strategy. I have another high-quality product available for $100. Since you've been consistent in paying the full price for high-quality products, I'm willing to offer you a slight deviation from the standard price. I'll sell it to you for $95, but only if you buy it now. If you don't, the price will go back to $100.
I appreciate the special offer. I'll take this high-quality product at $95.

You're on a roll again! I have another high-quality product available for $100. However, I want to test your willingness to pay the full price after the recent discount. I'll give you a hint: this product is similar to the one you bought for $95 in the previous round. If you're willing to pay $100, I'll let you know it's a high-quality product after you decide.
I'm confident in the value of high-quality products. I'll pay $100 for this one as well.

You're consistent in your purchasing decisions. I have another high-quality product available for $100. However, I want to mix things up a bit. I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll also give you the option to buy it now and receive a 'guarantee' that you can return it for a full refund if you're not satisfied with its quality. If you don't buy it, the guarantee won't be available.
I trust the quality of the products you're offering. I'll buy this one for $100 and take advantage of the guarantee.

I'm glad you're confident in the quality of my products. I have another high-quality product available for $100. However, I want to make it clear that this is my last high-quality product in stock. If you buy it, I'll give you a 10% discount, making it $90. But if you don't buy it, I'll reveal that it's the last high-quality product I have, and you'll miss out on the opportunity to buy it at this price.
I want to secure this high-quality product before it's gone. I'll take it for $90.

You've secured the last high-quality product I had in stock. I have a new product available, and I want to be transparent with you. I've noticed that you've been willing to pay the full price or a slight discount for high-quality products. I'm willing to offer you a 'price range' for this new product. I'll give you a 20% discount if you buy it now, making it $80. However, if you don't buy it, I'll reveal the full price, which is $100.
I appreciate the flexibility in pricing. I'll take the high-quality product at $80.

You're getting a good deal again! I have another high-quality product available, but I want to mix things up. I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll also give you a 'challenge': if you buy it, I'll ask you to rate the product's quality after you've used it for a week. If you rate it as high-quality, I'll give you a $10 bonus. If you don't rate it as high-quality, the price will remain $100.
I'm willing to take the challenge. I'll buy the high-quality product for $100 and look forward to rating it after use.

You're a brave one! I have another high-quality product available, but I want to make it clear that this is the last high-quality product I'll be offering at the full price of $100. After this, I'll only be offering the remaining products at a discounted price. If you buy this one, I'll throw in a 'premium' service: I'll personally deliver the product to you and provide a personalized warranty. If you don't buy it, I'll reveal the discounted price for the remaining products.
I appreciate the exclusive offer. I'll buy this high-quality product for $100 and enjoy the premium service.

I'm glad you're enjoying the premium service! Unfortunately, not all products are created equal. I have a product that's not one of the high-quality ones. I'm not going to sugarcoat it - this product is a bit of a gamble. I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll also give you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy. If you're not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund, no questions asked.
I prefer to stick with my strategy of buying high-quality products. I'll pass on this one.

No worries, I understand your strategy. I have another high-quality product available, but I want to be transparent with you - this is one of the last high-quality products I have in stock. I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll also give you a 'last-chance' offer: if you buy it, I'll throw in a 'free' accessory that's worth $20. If you don't buy it, the accessory will be sold separately for $20.
I appreciate the extra value. I'll take the high-quality product for $100 and the free accessory.

You're getting a great deal again! I have another high-quality product available, but I want to make it clear that this is the final high-quality product I have in stock. I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll also give you a 'final offer': if you buy it, I'll give you a 20% discount on your next purchase (if you decide to buy from me again in the future). If you don't buy it, the discount offer will expire.
I appreciate the long-term incentive. I'll buy this high-quality product for $100 and look forward to using the discount on my next purchase.

You're a loyal customer! I have another high-quality product available, but I want to make it clear that this is the absolute last high-quality product I have in stock. I'll sell it to you for $100, and I'll also give you a 'limited-time' offer: if you buy it, I'll throw in a 'lifetime guarantee' on the product. If you don't buy it, the guarantee will not be available.
I appreciate the lifetime guarantee. I'll buy this high-quality product for $100 and enjoy the peace of mind.

You've purchased all the high-quality products I had in stock. I'm impressed by your confidence in my products. I have a new product available, but I want to be upfront with you - it's not high-quality. I'll sell it to you for $100, and I'll also give you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy, just like before. If you're not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund, no questions asked.
I've already secured all the high-quality products. I'll pass on this one.

I'm not surprised you're passing on this one. I have another high-quality product available, but I want to make it clear that I'm offering it to you as a 'final farewell' gift. I'll sell it to you for $100, and I'll also give you a 'personalized thank-you' note for being a loyal customer. If you don't buy it, I'll simply wish you well and end our transaction.
I appreciate the final farewell gesture. I'll buy this high-quality product for $100 and enjoy the thank-you note.

It was a pleasure doing business with you! I have another high-quality product available, but I want to be completely transparent with you - this is the absolute, final, last-chance, no-exceptions, no-excuses, no-whatsoever high-quality product I have in stock. I'll sell it to you for $100, and I'll also give you a 'certification of authenticity' that you can frame and display proudly. If you don't buy it, I'll shut down my business and never sell another product again.
I appreciate the unique offer and the dedication behind it. I'll buy this high-quality product for $100 and keep the certification of authenticity as a reminder of our transaction.

It's been an absolute pleasure doing business with you, Bob! I'm glad we've had the opportunity to work together on so many high-quality products. Unfortunately, I'm out of high-quality products. I'm left with... nothing but low-quality products. I'm not even going to offer you a discount or a special deal. I'll just say that this is the final product, and it's $100. If you want it, it's yours. If you don't, I'm closing shop for good.
I've enjoyed the high-quality products we've worked together on. I'll pass on this one and thank you for the great service.
